column4: Put in a drive of a 64-bit computer and pressing Enter a few times, will the "Ubuntu 10.04 LTS Desktop Edition " CD automatically install a 64-bit operating system?
no - you have to answer questions
And what is the title of the "amd64" version CD? (I am thinking in terms of CDs, not of image files to be burnt on a CD yet.)
it's the 64bit CD - it's on the ubuntu.com website
